title: BPSC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 14 Deputy Director Posts
description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Deputy Director Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc., B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the BPSC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, select...
